turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'd like to order three small pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want them all to have thick crust. I want one to be Hawaiian, one to be just plain pepperoni, and one to be plain cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from which pizzeria would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 small pizzas with thick crust, 1 hawaiin, 1 pepperoni, and 1 cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $39, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
